system.title: System Integration
system.description: We are experienced at sensor and system integration for AVs including LiDARs, cameras, radars, GNSS systems along with Drive by Wire controllers.

software.title: Software Development
software.description: We can develop embedded software products for your many different works, including web applications, mobile applications, autonomous driving, mapping, image processing and much more.

hardware.title: Hardware Development
hardware.description: We can work on your industrial product development from documentation to the manufacturing with according to your design requirements.

algorithms.title: Algorithms Development
algorithms.description: We can develop and test novel algorithms for improved results for your real-world applications with state-of-the-art sensor fusion technologies.

consultancy.title: Consultancy Service
consultancy.description: We can take your goal one step further with our expert team in software, design, electronics and many other fields in the fields of autonomous vehicles, industrial automations.

supply.title: Supply
supply.description: Supply of defense equipment and ammunition from the world's leading manufacturers through representation and distributorship.
